snippet.title: Underground Garage - become a car mechanic in the world of illegal racing - First Teaser!
snippet.description:
Underground Garage is the next game from BeardedBrothers.games. After the Biker Garage success and thousands of satisfied players, we are creating another product in the "Garage" series! This time we are creating a game about being a car mechanic in the world of illegal racing. Repair, tune and finally take part in an illegal race yourself!


Add to wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452250/Underground_Garage/


Key information:
- Name: Underground Garage
- Platforms: Steam, Nintendo Switch, Playstation, Xbox.
- Release date: Q4 2021
- Developer & Publisher: BeardedBrothers.games

- Website: https://undergroundgaragegame.com


Social media:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/undergroundgaragegame
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/bbgames_darek
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/beardedbrothersgames/
- Pinterest: https://pinterest.com/beardedbrothersgames/
- Contact: lukasz@beardedbrothers.games, marcelina@beardedbrothers.games
